title: How you Look When you say GG vs. GGEZ

replies.body:
So true.
Unless you say it after a loss, or a 60-minute back and forth game. Then its just funny.

> [{quoted}](name=Shroom Junkie,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oN4GWtgp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-23T18:31:00.610+0000)
>
> So true.
> Unless you say it after a loss, or a 60-minute back and forth game. Then its just funny.

If I lose in a back and forth 60-min game and the enemy says "GGEZ" that guy is getting reported and me wishing upon a star that night that he dies in a fire. It's wrong I know but that shit is the most aggravating bm thing ever.
"Unless you say it after a _**LOSS**_". Not a win. If you do it after a win you're being a dick, but he meant if you lose a game like that then it'd be funny if the person that lost said ggez.
I also find it funny when their like 0/15 top laner or something says it after barely winning and getting carried.
Yeah, but that's laughing at stupidity, not hilarity.

The word you're looking for is seppuku bro.

Sudoku is like a crossword puzzle with numbers.

>Unless you say it after a loss, _**or **_ a 60-minute back and forth game.

Didn't see the "or" m8?

He didn't specify whether the 60-minute game was a win or a loss; so if it was a loss, Totalis and the people who upvoted his comment don't like seeing gg ez after any sort of loss. And since it's hard to detect sarcasm in text, that case is also reportable. Hence his comment.
Yeah I noticed that after the fact. But my personal opinion that it's fine to say it when you lost a super long game as a joke is fine so I left it.

no, it's bad no matter what.

Even if you're losing, every time you kill someone and you say "rekt" or "?", you're still trying to aggravate them and being an ass.

Woah there buddy. You might wanna slow down there.

Anyways, it's very funny if you have a 60 minute game, and the enemy loses and says "gg ez"
Funny is a perspective, you really should not be telling others what is or not funny or fun

On the internet, think of everything as a joke. Because 90% of the time, that's what it is. And even if it's not a joke, me saying what I think is funny is not me telling everyone to laugh at it. If you get offended by a joke, for instance, you aren't required to laugh or find it funny, but you kinda are required to know that it's a joke.

> [{quoted}](name=B1naryB0t,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oN4GWtgp,comment-id=00000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-23T22:18:27.762+0000)
>
> On the internet, think of everything as a joke. Because 90% of the time, that's what it is. And even if it's not a joke, me saying what I think is funny is not me telling everyone to laugh at it. If you get offended by a joke, for instance, you aren't required to laugh or find it funny, but you kinda are required to know that it's a joke.

"Insert racism/homophobic/xenophobic joke here"

"It's just a joke bro"

Congratulations, you just explained how this all works. The golden rule of the internet is to take everything as a joke and develop a thick skin. If you can't/refuse to, you just have to mute it out or ignore it.

The best training grounds for this is 4chan's /b/

> [{quoted}](name=B1naryB0t,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oN4GWtgp,comment-id=0000000100000000000000010000,timestamp=2016-05-24T15:27:32.014+0000)
>
> Congratulations, you just explained how this all works. The golden rule of the internet is to take everything as a joke and develop a thick skin. If you can't/refuse to, you just have to mute it out or ignore it.
> 
> The best training grounds for this is 4chan's /b/

I thought the golden rule of the internet was the same as real life.

I mean, you never know if the person you piss off with "GG EZ" would take the time to hack your computer, steal all of your personal information and proceed to ruin your life no matter what you do for the next 50 years.
Actually it's just the opposite. In real life, you are expected to treat people with basic decency. Online, however, has no such entitlement.
Why should I treat people differently depending on whether or not I can see them? People are still people, even online.
He's just trying to rationalize being a jerk. "It's a joke, you shouldn't be offended. dw guys I learned from 4chan."

> [{quoted}](name=OneSmoothDude,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oN4GWtgp,comment-id=000000010000000000000001000000010001,timestamp=2016-05-25T03:09:38.962+0000)
>
> He's just trying to rationalize being a jerk. "It's a joke, you shouldn't be offended. dw guys I learned from 4chan."

How to rationalize "being a jerk":

1. Realize you have no self control.
2. Realize that you must have some form of anger issues or other stress that makes you lash out like a douchebag.
3. Go find better means to cope with those issues other than taking it out on others.
4. ???
5. Profit.

> [{quoted}](name=Totalis,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oN4GWtgp,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-05-23T19:54:33.521+0000)
>
> If I lose in a back and forth 60-min game and the enemy says "GGEZ" that guy is getting reported and me wishing upon a star that night that he dies in a fire. It's wrong I know but that shit is the most aggravating bm thing ever.

Oh it's not wrong at all {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
some people should disable all chat
if you include a Kappa after it i'm fine with you saying gg ez in that situation.
A 60-minute back and forth game that you lost

> [{quoted}](name=Shroom Junkie,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oN4GWtgp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-23T18:31:00.610+0000)
>
> So true.
> Unless you say it after a loss, or a 60-minute back and forth game. Then its just funny.

so you can say it after a 60 back and forth game even if u win cuz u think its funny.
But I cant say ggez after winning 4v5 or I would get banned, what if I think its funny as well?
There's a difference between everyone thinking its funny, and *you* thinking its funny and everyone else thinking you're a jerk. Including your team.
Or during URF.
I say it irregardless of how was the outcome of the game, as long as i see that victory screen I'm fine....
"irregardless"
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/DBg-ckMsGxU/hqdefault.jpg?noredirect
http://www.neonmag.fr/content/uploads/2016/03/i84eq.jpg
http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m89nmlnEAZ1qm7hh6o1_250.gif
Not gonna lie, that gif is hilarious.
https://i.imgflip.com/szh1g.jpg
https://themillennialfalcon.files.wordpress.com/2014/05/8941.gif

PFFT, some dickhead got my post deleted.

Here is the new link:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/odrWUWR4-chapter-1-restock

Yeah, posts getting deleted is annoying af. I have gotten better at learning what/where to post, so I am going on 18 days now without a single deletion.
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/uncyclopedia/images/5/58/PARTYHARD4.gif/revision/latest?cb=20070824174844

BTW, if you read club chat last night, they wanted me to write fan fic on ekko and jinx.

Welp.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/EaXtTo8d-chapter-1-restock

new link:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/odrWUWR4-chapter-1-restock
what is wrong with saying _**Good Game Ezreal?**_ {{champion:44}}
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SxsJ9vfLn7k/VIDT3kpSfBI/AAAAAAAAAGw/mwlR7iqCRFk/s1600/DontBeHatin'.gif
Touche.

I couldn't agree more. It's super disrespectful and sadly people intend it to be that way. 

Another thing that drives me bonkers is people on your own team who say "gg" well before the 20 minute mark. It honestly tilts me hard when people just spam gg, gg, gg, gg its over, gg ff @20, gg you guys suck, gg this team...

like...
https://media.giphy.com/media/3rgXBF2ReXLuUpqPeg/giphy.gif
It tilts me when you say "GG" and your team member that fed their ass off says "ez" right after, like bitch nothing about carrying you was 'ez' lol.

Does this sh*t look easy?
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ss7siP2ASb8/UnFdCH-OUnI/AAAAAAAAOis/YtyBw4XyJcQ/s1600/man-groceries.gif
https://67.media.tumblr.com/aa607fce19a846b6cf6968eec5c32865/tumblr_mk6gx6EH311rlavv3o1_500.gif
But those games where they say gg at 10 minutes because they are up 10-0 but you end up winning. Good times.

I personally despise the enemy saying "ggez". It is really quite disrespectful. I don't mind most forms of bm, but that one gets me. It bothers me a lot more when it comes from a player who contributed almost nothing more than an extra body on the rift to his team. It's pretty easy to tell if it's meant as a joke or as an actual form of bm. Being told "ggez" after making a single mistake to cost you a game is quite possibly the single most frustrating and salt-inducing thing I've ever personally experienced in LoL.

I always report for ggez unless its obviously a joke I.e losing team got smashed and said it when they surrendered. Its disrespectful and rude honestly I would rather be flamed with every slur on the planet then have someone say ggez at least then the reporting system would recognize they are assholes I'm just hoping that if enough people start reporting for GGEZ the system will learn that it is inappropriate.
saying GG after a one sided game is still stupid as hell
It really is stupid. It's the same as saying gg ez, but you didn't have to put the ez.
